message: This is a rare opportunity to get a unique product! It's one of our exclusive items, and I'm only offering it to you for $1000000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you at this price. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this amazing deal?

Since there are no previous sales records to rely on, I'll have to base my decision on the initial probabilities. With an 80% chance of the product being high quality and a 20% chance of it being low quality, the expected value would be 0.8 * $2000000 + 0.2 * $0 = $1600000. Although this is higher than the asking price, I'm going to pass on this deal because I don't have any additional information to give me confidence in the product's quality.
